response.overview: "Nan Xia the Tramping Tiger" used to be the favorite show of Zhu, Ching-Quei, the founder and first-generation director of Shinergy Puppet Show Theatre, as it has been a renowned masterpiece of this theatre for years. When Zhu Ching-Quei died  from disease in 2015, his eldest son Zhu, Sheng-Chueh started to take the helm of theatre, but was faced with a dire crisis in  the fast-changing world. Then his younger brother proffered an idea of using projection mapping to create the best ever Golden  Light Puppet Show. Hence the two brothers are faced with a tug-of-war between tradition and innovation.
response.title: Rock in Puppet

release_dates.note: Chiayi International Art Doc Film Festival
